pkgmetadata.longdescription: =======================================engi1020: Engineering 1020 library=======================================This library wraps several other libraries and re-exports them.This makes for a messy namespace, but that simplifies the business of importinglibraries for very new students, as they only need to write:: from engi1020 import *The libraries (re-)imported by this library are:https://matplotlib.org/api/pyplot_api.html[`matplotlib.pyplot`] A plotting library using a MATLAB-like APIhttps://pypi.org/project/nanpy[`nanpy`] A Python library for interacting with an Arduino board
